A location entity would be a specific place, geographical area, or address. If you could provide a longer paragraph with more context, I would be happy to help identify any location entities.

Paragraph: The Great Barrier Reef, located in the Coral Sea, off the coast of Queensland, Australia, is the largest coral reef system in the world. It is composed of over 2,900 individual reefs and 900 islands stretching for over 2,300 kilometers over an area of approximately 344,400 square kilometers.
